availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Adair County, Kentucky, carpenter. Kentucky native. Married to Maria D. White. Father of Sarah F. White and James T. White. Carpenter in Adair County in 1860.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Adair County, District 1, p. 11. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Adair County, Columbia, District 1, p. 57. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kansas, Douglas County, Wakarusa Township, p. 12. Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Population Schedules, Missouri, Cass County, Pleasant Hill, p. 6.
